bgibbons.game.level

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • bgibbons.game.level.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to handle the game level including the tiles and and entities.

      • Level

        public Level(java.lang.String tileImagePath,
             java.lang.String entityImagePath,
             boolean mainLevel)
        Constructor for the Level object.
        Parameters:
        tileImagePath - Path to the location of the level tile image.
        entityImagePath - Path to the location of the level entity image.
        mainLevel - True if mainLevel, false otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • alterTile

        public void alterTile(int x,
                      int y,
                      Tile newTile)
        Changes the tile at a specific tile location with another tile.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the tile to be altered.
        y - The y coordinate of the tile to be altered.
        newTile - The new tile to replace the old tile.

      • generateLevel

        public void generateLevel()
        Generates the level tiles if no file is specified.

                                 int x,
                                 int y)

      • proceduralStep

        public java.lang.Boolean[][] proceduralStep(java.lang.Boolean[][] oldMap)
        Uses 4 rules of "The Game of Life" to generate a new map.
        Parameters:
        oldMap - Old boolean map representing the dungeon.
        Returns:
        A new boolean map representing the dungeon.

      • checkTile

        public int checkTile(java.lang.Boolean[][] map,
                     int x,
                     int y)
        Counts the number of live tiles surrounding the passed tile.
        Parameters:
        map - The boolean map representing the dungeon.
        x - The x coordinate of the current tile.
        y - The y coordinate of the current tile.
        Returns:
        The number of live tiles surrounding the passed tile.

      • getStart

        public int getStart()
        Returns the start tile
        Returns:
        The int corresponding to the start tile.

      • getEnd

        public int getEnd()
        Returns the end tile
        Returns:
        The int corresponding to the end tile.

      • tick

        public void tick()
        Ticks the tiles and entities in the level.

      • getTouching

        public Entity getTouching(Entity entity)
        Checks if the passed entity is touching any entities in the level
        Parameters:
        entity - Entity to compare with all level entities
        Returns:
        The level entity that the passed entity is touching, null if not touching

      • renderTiles

        public void renderTiles(Screen screen,
                        int xOffset,
                        int yOffset)
        Renders the tiles to be shown on the screen.
        Parameters:
        screen - Screen to be rendered to.
        xOffset - The x offset of the tiles to be rendered.
        yOffset - The y offset of the tiles to be rendered.

      • renderEntities

        public void renderEntities(Screen screen)
        Renders the entities on the level.
        Parameters:
        screen - Screen to render the entities onto.

      • getTile

        public Tile getTile(int x,
                    int y)
        Returns the tile at the given coordinate
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the tile to be returned.
        y - The y coordinate of the tile to be returned.
        Returns:
        The Tile object at the specified coordinates.

      • addEntity

        public void addEntity(Entity entity)
        Adds an entity to the level.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to be added to the level.

      • removeEntity

        public Entity removeEntity(Entity entity)
        Removes entity from the level.
        Parameters:
        entity - Removes given entity from the level, if it is there.
        Returns:
        An entity, if the entity was in the level and successfully removed, otherwise null.

      • respawnOrcs

        public void respawnOrcs(java.util.ArrayList<Orc> orcsInArea,
                        int xGridBoundary,
                        int rank)
        Respawns orcs on the level randomly
        Parameters:
        orcsInArea, - ArrayList of Orcs containing the orcs in the area that respawning it occuring
        xGridBoundary, - int to mark the boundary of the grid separating the different grids in the area for respawning
        rank, - int telling which rank to set the new orc at

      • spawn

        public void spawn(int dungeonNum,
                  int numEnemies)
        Spawns enemies for dungeons
        Parameters:
        dungeonNum - The number indicating which dungeon is spawning the entities. 1 spawns bandits, 2 spawns vampires
        numEnemies - The number of enemies to spawn
